comment.author: 43357047@N05
comment._content: My mother's family comes from Waterford...last name of Flavin

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fiddlersgreenstudio] Here're some Waterford Flavins for you...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 43357047@N05
comment._content: Thank you so much. The Flavin's I am decended from came to the Illinois area in the 1830's to help build a canal and work in the quarries around the towns of Lockport & Lemont. This was long before Chicago became a big town.

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fiddlersgreenstudio/] Any idea where in Waterford your ancestors were from? Seems there were a lot of Flavins in County Waterford in 1911 1911 Census

comment.author: 43357047@N05
comment._content: Once again...thanks much!!! I'm sure I still have a bunch of distant cousins in Waterford but it has been a long time since my ancesters left. I will ask my 91 year old mother if she has any specific information.By the way...actor Sylvester Stallone married a Flavin from Chicago.

comment.author: 63844591@N04
comment._content: Barracks was demolished having been partly destroyed by bombardment from the north side of the river Suir in the civil war siege of Waterford. And by the way there are a lot of Flavins in Waterford who spell their name as Flahavan...as in the famous local porridge maker

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
From The London Gazette, 14 April 1899:
The Northumberland Artillery (Western Division) The undermentioned Second Lieutenants to be Lieutenants:- ... H.J.P. King. Dated 15th April, 1899.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63844591@N04] That Flavin/Flahavan tip is good for [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fiddlersgreenstudio], thank you. And for the bombardment information...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 43357047@N05
comment._content: YES! Thank You!
